Small Error Of Undervalue

Study Case 1

ABDI BARAKAH TBK

1
2
3
4
Abdi Barakah Tbk. Statement of Finansial Position:

Mahakarya Leasing Group (MLG), as the lessor, leased a forklift to Abdi Barakah Tbk. (lessee) on January 1, 2019. The following is information related to the agreement:

1.Abdi Barakah Tbk. leased the machine for a duration of 7 years. Therefore, the leased asset will be recognized as a fixed asset by the company. 2.The fair value of the forklift in that year is Rp320,520,000. 3.The residual value of the asset is Rp2,325,000, and the estimated economic life is 8 years. 4.MLG establishes a rate of return of 6% per year.

At the end of the first lease period, Abdi Barakah Tbk. reports the Recognized Lease Asset on the Balance Sheet, based on SFAS 13 or IFRS 16 regulations.
